inclusion.criterion: criteria for the index case, clinical exam, answers to the questionnaire. Detailed family pedigree and information given to the index case for the relatives up the second degree of relativeness for participation in the present study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Blood puncture and urinary collection, imaging is required in the next three months only if not previously done.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient aged over 18 years, patient who underwent a clinical examination
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Index case with not confirmed Paget's disease of bone by biological and/or radiological examinations
exclusion.label: triggers
